original_text:
Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In
Con Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In, la nuova slot di Inspired Gaming, potrete pescare pesci dal valore inestimabile, anche grazie a uno speciale Wild tuttofare
Grafica di Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In
La parola estate fa rima con voglia di vacanze e sopratutto con mare. Il mondo dell’intrattenimento online si adegua a questo spirito vacanziero offrendo nuovi giochi ambientati sulla spiaggia dove l’acqua cristallina la fa da padrone. Accade anche con Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In, dedicata al mondo della pesca. La nostra griglia si trova sul fondo del mare, tra pesci, ami con l’esca, vecchi scarponi e un gabbiani con un salvagente intorno al collo.
La voglia di tuffarci per fare una bella nuotata dipende anche dall’ottima grafica, con i colori limpidi e dettagli che rendono l’ambientazione abbastanza reale.
Carino il comparto sonoro, con una bella musica di sottofondo.
Com’è fatta Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In
Vediamo ora come preparare la scommessa. La griglia, di dimensioni classiche con 5 rulli e 3 righe, ha 10 paylines fisse su cui puntare un minimo di 0,20 €.
Come in quasi tutti i giochi, anche qui si vince creando serie di almeno 3 simboli identici su rulli adiacenti, partendo dal primo a sinistra. Se otteniamo più combo paganti su una stessa linea, allora ci verrà accreditata solo quella di importo maggiore, viceversa se le combinazioni avvengono su linee diverse, allora le somme vinte verranno sommate.
Ci sono diverse opzioni per agevolare le giocate: una per invertire la disposizione dei pulsanti per i giocatori mancini, una per accelerare la rotazione dei rulli, una per attivare l’Autoplay e far andare in automatico gli Spin.
La volatilità è media, il ritorno teorico al giocatore è invece pari al 94,52%.
Come ottenere delle vittorie
Concentriamoci ora sui simboli base e su quelli speciali.
Un po’ come ovunque, le icone di basso livello sono rappresentate dalle carte da gioco dal dieci all’asso. Esse ripagano sino a 10 volte la puntata nel caso di una combo di 5 simboli. A seguire troviamo l’amo e lo scarpone che hanno identico valore e possono arrivare a ricompensare 50 volte la puntata. Il gabbiano e la coppa sono i simboli che valgono di più in assoluto.
I pesci sono simboli speciali che atterrano sempre accompagnati da una somma di denaro.
Con 3 Scatter si ottengono 10 giri gratuiti durante i quali compare il pescatore, ossia il Wild, che qui ha una duplice funzione: sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e colleziona i pesci presenti in quel momento sulla griglia. Inoltre, a ogni “pescata “, viene aggiunta una tacca al contatore posto in alto. Ogni 3 step raggiunti, si ottengono ulteriori Free Spins.
Dopo ogni vincita nel gioco base è possibile sfruttare la funzione Gamble. Ci troveremo davanti a due ruote, entrambe suddivise in due sezioni, verde e rossa, collegate a premi differenti: una incrementa le vincite, l’altra ricompensa con dieci o più Free Spins. Attenzione però, perché se la lancetta non si fermerà nel settore verde, perderete tutto.

Domande Frequenti 
Come posso ottenere il gioco Bonus?

Per giocare con i Free Spins è necessario che atterrino 3 Scatter o che dopo ogni vincita, nella funzione Gamble, la lancetta della ruota di destra si fermi nel settore verde. In alternativa è possibile acquistare la funzione giri gratis tramite l’apposito pulsante.



Posso giocare su qualsiasi smartphone?

Sì, questa slot ha un’architettura HTML5 che la rende adatta a ogni sistema operativo, Android, IOS etc.…



Qual è il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

Catch of the Day Reeling 'Em In ha un RTP del 94, 52%.

raw_translation.response:
Introducing Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In, the latest slot game from Inspired Gaming that gives you the chance to reel in fish of immeasurable value, thanks to a special Wild that can do it all.

The graphics of Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In are perfect for this time of year when everyone is craving a beach vacation and the clear blue water rules the scene in online entertainment. Our game’s grid is set deep beneath the ocean amidst fish, baited hooks, old shoes, and a seagull with a life preserver around its neck. The color scheme is stunning, and the attention to detail makes the setting quite realistic.

The sound department does a great job too with the perfect background music that’s great for experienced gamblers.

Now, let's talk about how to get started. The grid, with a classic layout of 5 reels and 3 rows, has 10 fixed paylines where you can bet a minimum of €0.20 per line.

As usual, winning combinations are formed by landing at least 3 identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one. If you land more than one winning combination on the same line, only the highest value combo is paid. If you have winning combinations on different lines, the amounts won will be added up.

There are several options to make gameplay a breeze, such as reversing the button layout for left-handed players, speeding up the reels’ rotation, and activating Autoplay for automatic spins. The volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player is 94.52%.

Now, let's focus on the base symbols and special ones. Just like in most games, the lower-paying icons are represented by playing cards from ten to ace. They pay up to 10 times the bet amount for a combo of 5 symbols. The hook and the shoe have the same value and can reward up to 50 times the bet amount. The seagull and the trophy are the highest paying symbols.

The fish are special symbols that always land with a cash amount. Landing 3 Scatters triggers 10 free spins, where the fisherman, the Wild symbol, appears on the grid. The Wild can replace all symbols except the Scatter and can collect the fish on the grid at that moment. After each catch, a marker is added to the counter at the top. Once you collect 3 markers, you get additional free spins.

After each win in the base game, you can use the Gamble feature. Two wheels are presented, each with two sections, green and red, that correspond to different prizes. One wheel increases your winnings, while the other rewards you with ten or more Free Spins. However, if the pointer doesn't stop in the green area, you'll lose everything.

FAQs

How do I trigger the Bonus game?

To play with Free Spins, you need to land 3 Scatters, or after each win, stop the pointer of the right wheel in the green area during the Gamble feature. Alternatively, you can buy the Free Spins function using the appropriate button.

Can I play on any smartphone?

Yes, this slot game has an HTML5 architecture that makes it suitable for every operating system, Android, IOS, etc.

What is the theoretical return to player?

Catch of the Day Reeling 'Em In has an RTP of 94.52%. So, get ready to dive into the deep blue sea and win big!

Review: Introducing Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In, the latest slot game from Inspired Gaming that gives you the chance to reel in fish of immeasurable value, thanks to a special Wild that can do it all.

The graphics of Catch of the Day Reeling ‘Em In are perfect for this time of year when everyone is craving a beach vacation and the clear blue water rules the scene in online entertainment. Our game’s grid is set deep beneath the ocean amidst fish, baited hooks, old shoes, and a seagull with a life preserver around its neck. The color scheme is stunning, and the attention to detail makes the setting quite realistic.

The sound department does a great job too with the perfect background music that’s great for experienced gamblers.

Now, let's talk about how to get started. The grid, with a classic layout of 5 reels and 3 rows, has 10 fixed paylines where you can bet a minimum of €0.20 per line.

As usual, winning combinations are formed by landing at least 3 identical symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one. If you land more than one winning combination on the same line, only the highest value combo is paid. If you have winning combinations on different lines, the amounts won will be added up.

There are several options to make gameplay a breeze, such as reversing the button layout for left-handed players, speeding up the reels’ rotation, and activating Autoplay for automatic spins. The volatility is medium, and the theoretical return to player is 94.52%.

Now, let's focus on the base symbols and special ones. Just like in most games, the lower-paying icons are represented by playing cards from ten to ace. They pay up to 10 times the bet amount for a combo of 5 symbols. The hook and the shoe have the same value and can reward up to 50 times the bet amount. The seagull and the trophy are the highest paying symbols.

The fish are special symbols that always land with a cash amount. Landing 3 Scatters triggers 10 free spins, where the fisherman, the Wild symbol, appears on the grid. The Wild can replace all symbols except the Scatter and can collect the fish on the grid at that moment. After each catch, a marker is added to the counter at the top. Once you collect 3 markers, you get additional free spins.

After each win in the base game, you can use the Gamble feature. Two wheels are presented, each with two sections, green and red, that correspond to different prizes. One wheel increases your winnings, while the other rewards you with ten or more Free Spins. However, if the pointer doesn't stop in the green area, you'll lose everything.

FAQs

How do I trigger the Bonus game?

To play with Free Spins, you need to land 3 Scatters, or after each win, stop the pointer of the right wheel in the green area during the Gamble feature. Alternatively, you can buy the Free Spins function using the appropriate button.

Can I play on any smartphone?

Yes, this slot game has an HTML5 architecture that makes it suitable for every operating system, Android, IOS, etc.

What is the theoretical return to player?

Catch of the Day Reeling 'Em In has an RTP of 94.52%. So, get ready to dive into the deep blue sea and win big!
